document.full_text: ten people, including a former assistant coach and two former basketball players at the university of san diego, have been indicted in connection with a scheme to fix games, federal prosecutors said on monday.
document.title: ex-basketball coach, players indicted for fixing games
lines_and_colors: ten people, including a former assistant coach and two former basketball players at the university of san diego, have been indicted in connection with a scheme to fix games, federal prosecutors said on monday.
